summary: Para la versión de esta página en español, ver a GAO-24-107464. As of Dec. 2023, at least 1,200 children have been found due to AMBER Alerts, which quickly communicate information to the public in certain child abduction cases. We found that all 50 states, 2 of the 5 U.S. territories, and 1 Tribe have AMBER Alert plans, which outline their processes for responding to such...
title: AMBER Alert Network: DOJ Efforts to Include Tribes and U.S. Territories
